body:
Hello.

We are recently being targeted by a numerous group of alts of a banned player which is sending keyloggers where from they can get everything you are typing plus get your IP, and probably get DDoS'd by someone.

If you don't want your ip exposed or people to get your passwords. Please don't click any links in chat unless you really really really trust their origin, like imgur.com, avicus.net. But never things like adf.ly or goo.gl.

You are responsible for your actions, thus that implies that is not our responsibility, and that we will be permanently banning people doing this, but meanwhile take care, please.

title: [IMPORTANT] Alert for keyloggers.
